profile_positions.description:
Client : Unilever
Role : Project Lead
Project: Advanced ATP(AATP) Implementation

Business Requirement:
Advanced ATP(AATP) is new to S/4, but most awaited functionality for our client since conventional Available-to-Promise (ATP) didn’t serve the purpose completely. ATTP 2021 is yet to be released in the market. But we got an opportunity to configure and test the functionality end to end well in advance before releasing in the market. AATP has a variety of features.

Main responsibilities and work contents:
 Attended workshops with all the stakeholders to understand their business process and the business requirements.
 Configured and tested end to end the below functionalities in AATP 2021 version 
       - Product substitution, 
       - Location Substitution, 
       - Product Allocation
       - Capacity allocation, 
       - Quota, 
       - BOP and BOP custom fields, 
       - Supply Protection, 
       - Supply Assignment

profile_positions.description:
Role : Product Architect
Project: Ireland and Nordics Pricing Implementation

Business Requirement:

Custom solution to do Pricing Simulation to send the price and subtotal values from S/4 to ACTPM via MuleSoft interface for promotional purpose. The pricing details will be obtained based on the relevant pricing procedures, condition types, access sequences and prices as maintained in ECC. 

Main responsibilities and work contents:
  Conducted workshops with all the stakeholders for AS-IS and TO-BE process.
 Configured the new pricing procedure in S/4 as like ECC with all relevant routines.
  Adjusted the configuration to skip and display the condition types during Pricing Simulation.
  Implemented the logic to fetch the FERT material and Subtotal value and on S/4 via DEBMAS, MATMAS and COND_A.
  V_NLN is enhanced as per the requirement of Pricing Simulation and Weekly batch job is scheduled for the PS on S/4 system.
  Custom tables have been created to capture the values in S/4 and BOM-Interface.
  Tested Delta scenario for Ireland and completed SIT, UAT, Hypercare and go live support.

profile_positions.description:
Client : Ferrara
Role : Product Architect
Project: SAP (ECC) Customer Product Allocation Implementation

Business Requirement:
All the customers except McLane, are managed by Ferrara. Ferrara SKUs can be classified into everyday turn items vs seasonal items. It has decided to adopt Product Allocation Management process as part of Sales Order cycle with an intent of -
- Solution to better management of Demand and Supply of Seasonal SKUs and Ensure fair distribution of supplies.
Main responsibilities and work contents:
 Conducted workshops with all the stakeholders to understand their business process.
 Adopted SAP(ECC) Standard Product Allocation and Rescheduling capabilities.
 Created Blueprint and FS documents and got sign off from business.
 Identified the test scenarios for Product allocation testing.
 Configured Product Allocation for Seasonal Products (Holiday, Easter, Halloween, Christmas) based on product hierarchy.
 Master Data - Existing Material/Customer Data adjustment as per allocation design for seasonal SKUs.
 Designed Custom Utility Tool and developed Custom Allocation Report - Standard MCSI report – Drill down to sales order level.
 Introduced a new Custom field for identifying Product Allocation Cut on Sales Order Item.
 Demo and Trainer program for super users and then super users trained the end users and Hypercare and Go-live support.
